name: The Very Last, Conclusive, and Final 3 Minutes and 42 Point 496 Seconds of the Universe
name_original: The Very Last, Conclusive, and Final 3 Minutes and 42 Point 496 Seconds of the Universe
description:
Which Then Ceases to Exist After the Aforementioned 3:42.496 Minutes Which are the Final Ones of the Universe A game about being the Moon and being a little sad but also a little beautiful in space.

By Bec, Lee, Lorg, Nyusha, and Tori

This game is a mostly polished prototype made in a few weeks! If you liked it, tell us why, and then go outside and blow a kiss to the Moon and maybe appreciate gravity a little bit next time it works for you.
